model.cards.weapons

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.cards.Card
      • model.cards.weapons.Weapon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Heatseeker, WeaponAlternative, WeaponOptional1, Whisper

    public abstract class Weapon
extends Card
    Superclass from which all weapons with additional no fire modes extend
    Author:
    Marco Maria Ferrara

    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(java.lang.String name,
              Ammo pickUpCost,
              Ammo baseCost,
              int baseDamage,
              int baseMarks,
              int baseTargetsNumber,
              Model model)
        Constructor for all weapons with no additional fire mode
        Parameters:
        name - name of the weapon
        pickUpCost - the cost to pay to pickup the weapon
        baseCost - the cost to pay to reload the weapon
        baseDamage - amount of damage for the base fire mode
        baseMarks - number of marks for the base fire mode
        baseTargetsNumber - number of available targets for the base fire mode
        model - instance if the Model class
